aircraft.value: Titan Heavy - AC-8475-818 at Base Delta

defect_observed.value: Cabin pressurization rate anomaly. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective De-icing System component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 24/11/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 26/11/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 27/11/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 29/11/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 29/11/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification

DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Cabin pressurization rate anomaly. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective De-icing System component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
